reviewText:
This dvd is a pirate homemade video, even the printing on the dvd is a poor quality print. On the back of the case they tried to cheat and mislead possible buyers showing an address and including a bar code trying to make it appear as it's a legitimate factory made copy when it's not. When you start the menue the first thing that pops up is an email address, I guess from the person who made this dvd copy which is always used for people who make home videos that try to advertise "their work" to get you buy more.

The video quality I would rate it as 6 or maybe 6 and half tops out of 10. The sound is the only Spanish version that it was available back in the 80's which was made in Puerto Rico, so you can actually hear a slight Puerto Rican accent during the dialogue. They translated absolutely everything, for example: Boss is not "Boss" anymore is "Jefe", "Dr. Hell" is "Dr. Infierno", etc.

What it really took a toll on me is the fact that is so clear this dvd was made in somebody's house, it's not original, I know there are not original Spanish masters from this show sold to the public however if they want to sell it as a collective item from fans to fans they should advertise it correctly and not mislead possible buyers like me that I actually bought this dvd thinking it was a factory made dvd that some company released after acquiring the rights to do so.

The dvd only has the first 5 episodes out of a total of 56 this show originally had. So I guess they expect for us to buy at least 9 or 10 more dvd's to complete the whole anime. Don't waste your money that way.

No entiendo porque Amazon no ha censurado estas publicaciones ya que el vendedor ofrece productos Piratas y copiados que ni siquieran son de discos originales.

Me aventure a comprar una vez y de verdad la calidad no es la esperada para el precio y las condiciones del producto dan mucho que desear.

Acostumbro a ser buen cliente cuando encuentro un buen vendedor. Les aseguro que no sere cliente de este vendedor una vez mas.

Por el contrario, les recomiendo a los amigos de Kat's Anime que a pesar de no listar en Amazon, ofrecen material de excelente calidad: Candy, Remi, Mazinger, Heidi, Dragon Ball, Saint Seiya y cientos de series clasicas y peliculas y de verdad a mi parecer, se esfuerzan bastante bien para dar satisfaccion a sus clientes..

No puedo colocar aca la direccion de su pagina web, pero si googlean usando el tag Kat's Anime los podran encontrar en la primera posicion de resultados. Su pagina es muy famosa en Venezuela. Envian a todo el mundo y aceptan PayPal como medio de pago.

Bueno, tal vez mi opinion no ayude a todos, pero espero ayude a muchos a encontrar un buen grupo donde adquirir sus colecciones de oro.. como yo lo hice. Los recomiendo!.

Saludos.

Andreina. Miami, FL.
This is a great dvd. Extreemly hard to find dubbed in Spanish. I highly recommend this product to any Japanese Anime Fans.
